full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### ITT Crane and Shore Power Installation

#### Notice Cancelled

The following notice has been cancelled, as it is now past the closing date which was set for **December 13, 2023 at 14:00:00**.

### Notice Details
- **Title (English)**: EC015-240899 – ITT Crane and Shore Power Installation SABS - Saint Andrews, NB
- **Title (French)**: EC015-240899 – Appel d'offres Grue et installation d’alimentation à quai – Station biologique de Saint Andrews, à Saint Andrews, NB
- **Reference Number**: WS4310600785-Doc4310611785
- **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contract Overview
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to perform crane and shore power installation at the Saint Andrews Town Wharf in Saint Andrews, New Brunswick.

The scope of work involves the supply and installation of a 408 kg (900 lb) capacity free-standing jib crane and the supply and installation of 80A, 240V, 3PH shore power for the Viola M. Davidson.

### Eligible Firms
Pre-qualified firms that qualified under Supply Arrangement EC373-202599 – SA Minor Works NB - Electrical Category are eligible to participate in this opportunity. These firms include:
- Al’s Electric Ltd.
- Avondale Construction Ltd.
- Landco Construction Ltd.
- Sutherland Excavating
- McGraw Electrique Ltee.

### Contract Requirements
- **Estimated Value**: $100,001 to $500,000
- **Delivery Date**: 16 weeks after contract award
- **Bid Security**: Mandatory requirement
- **Notice Type**: RFP against Supply Arrangement

### Additional Information
Firms are encouraged to review the solicitation for further details.

* If you would like to apply or have further questions, please contact the contracting authority:
+ Name: Alexandria Dwyer
+ Email: [alexandria.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alexandria.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) 
+ Role: [Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)]
